text: Clare B Dimyon MBE is a LGBT+ rights campaigner. In 2010 she was awarded the Member of the Order of the British Empire for "services to promoting the rights of lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people in central and eastern Europe". In 2016 Dimyon spoke to the press about her experience as a survivor of a violent life-threatening sexual assault in 1984,https://www.objectnow.org/s/3_The-Day-I-taught-a-man-Consent-while-he- was-Raping-me_19-Apr-84-1.pdf in support of a 14 year old who was abducted and raped in Oxford. == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:British Quakers Category:Honorary Members of the Order of the British Empire Category:LGBT rights activists from the United Kingdom
title: Clare Dimyon
